item.description: Connecticut Whale 3 p.m. Hartford Civic Center - XL CENTER We will going to see an American Hockey League game between the Connecticut Whale (formerly Hartford Wolfpack) and the Portland Pirates. The game starts at 3 p.m. Tickets are $12 with members receiving a $5 discount. Please plan on arriving no later than 2:30 as all tickets will be purchased at once. Visit www.ctwhale.com for team info.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet near the box office
item.name: Connecticut Whale
